title.rendered: G2 Winter 2022 Report – Hivency by SKEEPERS gets in top rankings!

content.rendered:
The leading software evaluation platform G2 helps many companies make purchasing decisions and publishes annual reports that give the reader a clear picture of the best technology solutions on the market.  

In the latest report published by G2 in December 2021, Skeepers’ Influence solution (Hivency) received 7 rewards!  

  • Leader Winter 2022  
  • Leader Europe Winter 2022  
  • Momentum Leader Winter 2022 
  • Leader Small Business Winter 2022  
  • High Performer Mid-Market Winter 2022  
  • High Performer Enterprise Winter 2022  
  • Most Implementable Winter 2022 

Among these awards, 4 had already been received in the previous report from July 2021. Hivency by SKEEPERS is very proud to receive 3 new awards in 2022, and thank our customers for their trust!

“Leader”: This category means that the product is “Leader” of the winter 2022 report and has been highly ranked by G2 Crowd users and received very good satisfaction and market presence scores. 

“High performer”: Products in the “High performer” category have high customer satisfaction scores. 

“Most Implementable”: This badge is awarded to products with the highest implementation score. Products in the “Most Implementable” category have received both a minimum of 10 reviews and 5 responses from real users for each of the implementation-related questions. (source: G2 2022 Report).  

 Our customers’ reviews 

Customer satisfaction is a core value of SKEEPERS’ Influence solution (Hivency) and we made it our priority. Our teams support brands in their influencer marketing strategy on a daily basis, helping them by providing all the necessary tools on a single platform and offering personalized support.

Here are some of the reviews written by our clients:  

  • “Easily usable platform and great support”   
  • “Very good platform for managing micro-influence campaigns” 
  • “Perfect experience with a fantastic team” 
  • “Very user-friendly tool for marketing micro-influence at a competitive cost” 

Discover all our customers’ reviews on G2’s website.

To see our previous awards have a look at this article.
